body.name: Avolusion HDDGear 4TB (4000GB) USB 3.0 External Gaming Hard Drive (Designed for Xbox One, Pre-Formatted) - 2 Year Warranty
features: Compatible with XBOX ONE X, S, Orginal
XBOX File System Pre-Formatted, Expand Game Console hard drive storage instantly!
Add extra storage to your game console without opening up the case
body.description: Avolusion HDDGear HDDGU3 4TB (4-Terabyte) External Gaming Hard Drive is the value hard drive upgrade kit provides the best and easy solution to expand your game console storage capacity instantly! Plug and Play USB 3.0 interface providing a perfect portable storage solution for you to store & backup your game data, music, picture, video and more! Avolusion HDDGear External Gaming Hard Drive designed to work with your game console perfectly! . It comes with silent fan-less design to keep your External Gaming Hard Drive operate quietly! Avolusion HDDGear HDDGU3 External Gaming Hard Drive Upgrade Kit features high-quality construction, advanced external interface technology, durable chassis and state-of-the-art industrial design, assured to provide you with years of reliable performance.

productInformation.name: Customer Reviews
productInformation.value: 4.6 4.6 out of 5 stars 632 ratings 4.6 out of 5 stars

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 30, 2018
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy Install, Lots of space, runs quietly, easier to use on PlayStation consoles.
reviews.reviewText: Originally purchased for my Xbox One S, then reformatted and used for my PS4 Pro after trading consoles. It worked wonderfully for both consoles without many issues during use. It was quite a bit easier to set up on my PS4 than it was for my Xbox, although I am unsure if that was just my personal experience with it. When I plugged it into my Xbox, I had a bit of a difficult time figuring out how to find it, and after finding out how, realised my Xbox wasnt detecting it. The Xbox also prompted me that it was connected to the HD over and over if i put it into low power mode, and then turned it back on later. I also had to manually set everything to install to it, as the console kept prompting me that I was out of useable memory before hand.. After unplugging it a couple times and replugging it in, I got it to work in just a few minutes. When I plugged it into my PS4, the console automatically detected it, and brought up a page asking if I would like to format it. It very quickly formatted, and instantly began saving all content to the device.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Level Up Your Storage: Avolusion’s 4TB Gaming Drive
reviews.reviewText: The Avolusion HDDGear 4TB (4000GB) USB 3.0 External Gaming Hard Drive, designed specifically for Xbox One, arrives with promises of expanded storage and seamless gaming experiences. Let’s dive into the details.Design/Assembly:The design of this external hard drive is sleek and functional. Its compact form factor ensures it won’t take up much space near your console. The assembly process is straightforward—simply plug it into your Xbox One’s USB port, and it’s ready to go. The matte black finish gives it a professional look. As for longevity, the 2-year warranty provides peace of mind. I've had it for almost 5 years and it still works like a charm.Functionality/Performance:Using this product is as easy as connecting a USB drive. It comes pre-formatted for Xbox One, so there’s no need for complex setup. Assembly is less than a minute! The 4TB capacity offers ample room for game installations, DLCs, and media files. In terms of performance, it delivers reliable data transfer speeds via USB 3.0. While it won’t outperform high-end SSDs, it’s a solid choice for expanding your console’s storage.Comparison/Recommendation:Compared to other external gaming hard drives, the Avolusion HDDGear 4TB stands out for its compatibility with Xbox One. It’s tailor-made for gamers who want hassle-free storage expansion. However, if lightning-fast load times are your priority, consider investing in an SSD. Additionally, check if cloud storage options meet your needs before making a decision.Conclusion:In summary, the Avolusion HDDGear 4TB External Gaming Hard Drive is a reliable companion for Xbox One enthusiasts. Even YEARS later the HD still works and remains intact. Whether you’re hoarding game titles or backing up precious saves, this drive has your back. For the price, it strikes a balance between capacity and affordability. Level up your storage game! 🎮🔌

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 9, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very good for the price
reviews.reviewText: It does its job really well. It can be a little on the noisy side, but maybe I've just gotten used to solid state drives. Like I can hear it whirring up from time to time. Set up was a breeze.

reviews.reviewText: Bought it for my grandson and he didn’t complain! Well worth the money.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 14, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great hard drive. Lots of storage and easy to use.
reviews.reviewText: Great hard drive for your Xbox. I mounted mine on the side of my Xbox with mounting tape! Works great. Never had a problem with it. It’s easy to setup and looks good anywhere you put it. Highly recommend to get.

reviews.reviewText: It's working really good so far and I love it, I just got it today tho so we'll see but i alao got a 4TB anf i only have 3TBs so im confused

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 8, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars AMAZING DRIVE FOR THIS PRICE!
reviews.reviewText: I just bought my third one. Bought the first 2 years ago for my One S. Then got one for the One X. This one is for PS4 Pro. GREAT product ready to go out of the box, problem free operation and it's FOUR TB's for less than $100! Outstanding.
